item.title: WATCH: Children orphaned in Gaza get graduation ceremony
item.description: Over 1,000 orphans are receiving support and classes at Al-Wafaa Orphan Village in Khan Younis.

item.title: US applications for jobless benefits rise last week, but layoffs remain historically low
item.description: More Americans filed for unemployment benefits last week, but U.S. layoffs remain in the same historically healthy range of the past few years
